_header: A ware wise looker / A ware wise keeper
_description: On true love — three monorhyming lines in a Latin-English sermon

OxfMert248.Transcription: A war wys lokereA war wys kepereA war wis spellere

Pfander,  Homer Garrison. 
             “The Popular Sermon of the Medieval Friar in England.”
